description.value:
You can project your premonitions of clarity to your allies.

When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Premonition Of Clarity], allies within 15 feet of you who failed the same saving throw against the same mental effect can also spend their reactions to reroll the failed saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus.
